channel.title: Basic sd format and raw files
channel.description:
Hallo,
i'm trying to use the demos named sampling and i cannot understand:
1) the error file error: FR_NO_FILESYSTEM, filename:"" file error: FR_NO_FILESYSTEM, filename:"/START.BIN"
So how should i create a new filesystem on the card? The card is formatted for windows and contains as well several ableton projects. It's a 64 gb micro sd.
After trying to upload via the file manager menu i get from the log event console:
uploading: /DS/Bd.raw file error: FR_NO_FILESYSTEM, filename:"/DS/Bd.raw" uploading : 100% file error: FR_INVALID_OBJECT, filename:""

item.title: Basic sd format and raw files
item.dc:creator: @marcello
item.description:
@marcello wrote:

Ok, i've already found the answer in the forum....

So I've used the util/format module and now should work.

Read full topic
item.source: Basic sd format and raw files
